div.p: Simulated nitrogen-cycle changes (year 8000 minus year 2000). a Annual mean vertically integrated nitrogen fixation, b annual mean vertically integrated denitrification, c surface concentrations in N* = NO 3 – 16 PO 4, and d zonally averaged N*. Green contours refer to the maximum extent of suboxic waters (O 2 < 5 μM) in year 2000, magenta contours to the maximum extent of suboxic waters in year 8000
